name: Kirby's Halloween Adventure
overview:
Halloween themed hack of Kirby’s Adventure. It’s Halloween time on Dream Land, and a Nightmare is spreading across the land! The undead rise! As Kirby, it is your job to protect Dream Land from this sudden rise of creepy critters! Go through prairies with pumpkins, spooky seasides, streets of skull and more! Help Kirby defeat the bad guys and save your kingdom!

The final patch includes many features:

Dozens of new enemy sprites have been added in, giving several facets to many of this classic game’s enemies!
Modified Mid-Bosses! Bonkerstein, Waiu, and others!
6 Brand new level tilesets (Old West, Underground Gallery, Factory, Circus, Volcano Temple & Graveyard)
Modified bosses, like Adeleine taking over Paint Roller’s spot, Kracko being fought on a large city, etc.
Several classic levels re-imagined in Adventure’s format, expect some levels paying homage to Kirby games that came after Adventure.
A completely new campaign through spooky worlds! Now every level is completely custom and transitions nicely into each other.
you can shoot a clown in quick draw.
